mapper.update: update student_info set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, expire_at = #{expireAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, username, pwd, create_at, expire_at, qq, email, address, phone, status from student_info
mapper.insert:
